subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage caps on GPT-4o/GPT-4 (~40 messages every 3 hours, varies with demand)
Higher usage limits than the free tier, with caps on conversations (e.g., ~5x more usage)
Access to Gemini 1.5 Pro in apps, subject to usage policies and fair use caps

llama_3_instruct_70b.notes: No direct API pricing from Meta. Cost is incurred through self-hosting or third-party platforms (e.g., AWS, Replicate, Azure), whose prices vary.

copilot_pro.features: Priority access to latest models, GPT-4 Turbo, advanced image creation

microsoft_365_copilot.features: AI assistant integrated across Microsoft 365 apps (Word, Excel, Teams, etc.)

qwen_long.notes: Pricing is for the first 4M input tokens.

pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression, with new flagship models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) being cheaper than previous-gen flagships. Emergence of ultra-low-cost 'flash'/'haiku' tier models for high-volume, less-complex tasks. Subscription models for consumers remain stable at $20/month, bundling access to top-tier models.
